title: Patch Notes say Sterak's gives +40% Base AD on passive trigger but in game text says +30%

replies.body: seem that the typos and wording has caused a lot of confusion. There are many who seem to think that runaans has completely lost its interaction with all on hits, there was the recent correction on dorans, many are still in a state of confusion of stoneplates interaction with true damage.
it was 30 for the entire PBE cycle
Trust in the patch notes young one, there are in-game text errors all the time.
Conflicting advice here @_@ first comment says 30%. Idk where to place my faith.

I checked out the PBE's notes and it's 30%.
For some reason they had a monkey doing the numbers this patch because there are a few other number issues (like the price on Banshee's Veil in the notes being 2500 instead of 2700 or something like that).

Ah I see. Well it's alot to go over so I'm sure the editor had alot of work on their plate and a few mistakes are to be expected. Though at the same time... does anyone on the balance team proof-read this? Lol

When Phreak was doing his patch analysis on youtube he got confused when he came across Banshee's 2500 because he does charts to show how changes were before compared to how they are now.

In his chart he had 2700 as the calculated number but the patch notes said 2500 so it confused the hell out of him until a Rioter in his stream told him it was an error in the notes.

I mean blade of the ruined king still says it does damage instead of "steals movespeed" and the keystone changes few patches ago took 2 patches to actually have the text in game changed so honestly just trust what you read online
